page.title: 19HOME LIFE
page.content: WHEN THE TOWN WAS FIRST BUILT, THE FAMILIES THAT MOVED HERE CAME FROM ARES WHERE THERE WAS NOT ENOUGH HOUSES. MANY FAMILIES ORIGINALLY CAME FROM LONDON, AND THE FOOTBALL TEAM THAT THE FATHERS SUPPORTED OFTEN REPRESENTED WHERE THEY ORIGINALLY CAME FROM. THE FAMILES USUALLY HAD FOUR OF MORE CHILDREN AND THIS IS THE REASON WHY THEY NEEDED RE-HOUSING. SO, THERE WERE FAR TOO MANY YOUNG CHILDREN IN BASILDON AND THEY BECAME A NUISANCE, ROAMING AROUNFD THE TOWN CENTRE AT NIGHT AND MAKING A NUISANCE OF THEMSELVES. NOW MOST OF THEN HAVE GROWN UP, AND MARRIED AND NOW LIVE IN A HOUSE IN BASILDON OF THEIR OWN. A FEW YEARS AGO, THE CORPORATION OFFERED ALL THE RENTED HOUSE FOR SALE, AND ABOUT A THIRD OF THE TENANTS BOUGHT THEM. MANY OF THESE HAVE NOW MOVED OUT OF BASILDON.
